name: No. 5 Eau de Parfum
description: The essence of femininity. A powdery floral bouquet.

review.summary: Timeless and sophisticated.

name: Sauvage
description: A radically fresh composition inspired by wide-open spaces.

review.summary: An absolute compliment magnet with high projection.

name: Baccarat Rouge 540
description: A poetic alchemy of jasmine, saffron, and ambergris.

review.summary: Smells like pure luxury; incredible sillage.

name: Black Opium
description: An addictive gourmand with notes of black coffee and vanilla.

review.summary: Sensual, dark, and energetic.

name: Bleu de Chanel
description: A tribute to masculine freedom in an aromatic-woody trail.

review.summary: The ultimate versatile blue scent for any occasion.

name: Santal 33
description: The soft drift of smoke and an open fire.

review.summary: Iconic and woody; defines niche perfumery for many.

name: Good Girl
description: A bold blend of dark and light elements.

review.summary: Sexy and powerful; perfect for evening wear.

name: Eros
description: Love, passion, beauty, and desire in a bottle.

review.summary: Sweet and loud; excellent for clubbing.

name: Tobacco Vanille
description: A warm English gentleman’s club with spiced tobacco.

review.summary: Opulent, cozy, and extremely high quality.

name: J'adore
description: A grand feminine floral with a balanced bouquet.

review.summary: Radiant, golden, and universally loved.

name: Acqua di Gio
description: Inspired by the sea, air, and sun.

review.summary: The benchmark for aquatic, fresh fragrances.

name: Angels' Share
description: A cocktail of boozy cognac and sweet cinnamon.

review.summary: Masterpiece gourmand that smells like warm apple pie.

name: Delina
description: A modern, nuanced floral bouquet.

review.summary: The 'it-girl' rose scent; feminine and potent.

name: Aventus
description: Audacious, contemporary, and confident.

review.summary: Expensive but unrivaled in its masculine DNA.

name: Lost Cherry
description: A full-bodied journey into the once-forbidden fruit.

review.summary: Rich, dark, and syrupy, though longevity is moderate.

name: La Vie Est Belle
description: The fragrance of joy and happiness.

review.summary: Sweet and incredibly long-lasting floral gourmand.

name: Le Male Elixir
description: A burning intensity of wood and spices.

review.summary: Warm, honeyed, and currently trending on social media.

name: Jazz Club
description: Memory of cocktails and cigars in a Brooklyn club.

review.summary: Cozy and slightly smoky lounge vibe.

name: Goddess
description: A unique aromatic gourmand featuring three vanillas.

review.summary: The ultimate comfort scent for vanilla lovers.

name: Oud Wood
description: Pioneering composition of exotic woods and spices.

review.summary: Professional, dry, and highly sophisticated.

name: You
description: Personalized scent that smells different on everyone.

review.summary: The perfect 'no-perfume' perfume.

name: Libre
description: The scent of freedom for a modern woman.

review.summary: Powerful, clean, and professional.

name: The Most Wanted
description: A magnetic and sophisticated woody-spicy scent.

review.summary: A delicious gourmand for men that lasts all night.

name: Wood Sage & Sea Salt
description: Windswept walks along the English coast.

review.summary: Airy and fresh; great for layering.

name: Born in Roma
description: A couture floriental celebrating your roots.

review.summary: Trendy and youthfully elegant.

name: Spicebomb Extreme
description: A massive spicy amber explosion.

review.summary: A winter staple with nuclear performance.

name: Molecule 01
description: A minimalist aroma that works with your pheromones.

review.summary: Subtle, magnetic, and very clean.

name: Coco Mademoiselle
description: The essence of a bold, free woman.

review.summary: The gold standard for modern feminine elegance.

name: Terre d'Hermès
description: A symbolic narrative exploring the earth and sky.

review.summary: Masterful earthy citrus for the mature gentleman.

name: Naxos
description: A tribute to the deep heart of Sicily.

review.summary: The best honey-tobacco fragrance ever made.

name: Daisy
description: A whimsical, bright, and charming floral.

review.summary: Youthful, fresh, and universally pleasing.

name: Y Eau de Parfum
description: The scent of accomplishment for the creative man.

review.summary: Excellent performance and very mass-appealing.

name: Philosykos
description: Memory of a Greek summer at Mount Pelion.

review.summary: The most realistic fig scent in the world.

name: Flowerbomb
description: An explosive floral bouquet that makes everything positive.

review.summary: Sweet, strong, and ultra-feminine.

name: Light Blue Pour Homme
description: Captures the fresh spirit of the Mediterranean.

review.summary: A summer classic that never goes out of style.

name: Imagination
description: An infinite creative impulse driven by citrus and tea.

review.summary: The pinnacle of high-end fresh fragrances.

name: Born in Roma Donna
description: A high-fashion floriental made of three jasmines.

review.summary: Perfectly balanced sweetness with an edgy twist.

name: Explorer
description: A woody-aromatic-leather scent for the adventurer.

review.summary: A high-quality, budget-friendly Creed Aventus alternative.

name: Khamrah
description: An oriental vanilla spicy fragrance with a warm trail.

review.summary: Incredible value; smells much more expensive than it is.

name: L'Interdit
description: A tribute to bold femininity and the thrill of the forbidden.

review.summary: Classy, dark floral with major longevity.

name: Luna Rossa Ocean
description: A neo-fresh fragrance exploring new horizons.

review.summary: Clean, soapy, and modern.

name: Missing Person
description: A skin scent that evokes the memory of a loved one.

review.summary: Intimate and clean; feels like a warm hug.

name: Cheirosa 62
description: Summer in a bottle inspired by the beaches of Rio.

review.summary: Extremely addictive and youthful tropical scent.

name: Stronger With You
description: A charming, mysterious, and confident fragrance.

review.summary: Warm, nutty, and sweet; a fall/winter favorite.

name: Gypsy Water
description: A fever dream of nomadic life in the woods.

review.summary: Woody, ethereal, and very unique.

name: Alien
description: A solar, mystical fragrance from another world.

review.summary: One of the most unique and potent jasmines ever made.

name: Polo 67
description: The spirit of athletic excellence and masculine power.

review.summary: The latest sporty-fresh release from Ralph Lauren.

name: Oud Satin Mood
description: A shimmering oriental fragrance that mimics satin on skin.

review.summary: Luxurious, powdery rose and oud with beastly performance.

name: Cloud
description: An uplifting, artistic expression of positivity.

review.summary: Fluffy, sweet, and often compared to high-end niche scents.

name: Vanilla 28
description: A masterpiece of refined and cultivated nuance.

review.summary: Boozy, sweet, and the ultimate layering vanilla.
